new-list.prodDescription: Bold shirt jacket from UO’s own BDG. Structured cotton design fitted with a button placket and pockets at the front.
Classic cotton t-shirt topped with throwback Creedence Clearwater Revival graphics at the front.
Hoodie topped with Modelo graphics. Features a classic pullover style with an adjustable hood and kanga pocket. Finished with ribbing trims.

best-list.prodName: Out From Under Lori Terry Racerback Jumpsuit
best-list.prodDescription: Slouchy jumpsuit by Out From Under made from a soft cotton terry for a casual touch and feel. Fits relaxed through the sleeveless top with a sleek racerback and banded waist. Scoop neck design finished with an ultra-relaxed bottom featuring a dropped inseam and tapered legs.

best-list.prodName: Urban Renewal Remnants Upcycled Quilt Applique Linen Chore Coat
best-list.prodDescription: Chore coat topped with upcycled quilt patch accents at the pocket and back. Features a button placket to the front & tab collar. Each is unique & will vary from what is pictured.

An icon reimagined with fiercely punk-inspired details in this platform iteration of Dr. Martens’ classic 8-eye combat boot. Smooth leather boot cut above ankle with an 8-eye lace-up closure and back pull tab. With their air-cushioned sole with top-stitch detailing complete with cotton laces, metal eyelets and a slightly raised heel. Finished with their signature slip-resistant rubber sole in a towering platform with iconic yellow stitching.

md-list.prodName: Champion UO Exclusive Reverse Weave Tipped Crew Neck Sweatshirt
md-list.prodDescription: Essential crew neck sweatshirt by Champion crafted in the brand’s signature reverse weave. Pullover style and topped with logo accents at the left chest & sleeve. Finished with striped accents at the ribbed cuffs, hem and neck. Only at Urban Outfitters.
Staple shirt jacket from BDG crafted from a woven corduroy for a casual look we love. Only at Urban Outfitters.

md-list.prodName: BDG Dad Slim Tapered Jean – Nostalgia Wash
md-list.prodDescription: Essential dad jeans from BDG, exclusively available at Urban Outfitters. 100% cotton denim is cut in a relaxed fit with a slightly tapered leg opening and 5-pocket detailing. Topped with patch icon accents. Finished with a zip fly & button waist closure.
